targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app_kubernetes_io_component="$component", namespace="$namespace", area="heap", ataccama_com_mde_workload="web"}) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app_kubernetes_io_component="$component", namespace="$namespace", area="heap", ataccama_com_mde_workload="web"})

panels.title: GraphQL requests per interval by SUCC/ERROR

panels.description: Gauge reaching out to database to see number of requests, grouped by status.
panels.title: Overall requests statuses

panels.description: Gauge reaching out to database to see number of requests, grouped by status.
panels.title: Overall requests statuses

panels.description: Duration of the whole processing that is currently worked on. 1 request can contain multiple connections. Check is executed every 10 seconds.
panels.title: Request processing: duration (progress check every 10 sec)

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

options.content:
All graphql paths are wrapped under:  
* `Query.*` and `Mutation.*` and they can't be easily excluded from pie chart

targets.expr: sum(increase(graphql_datafetcher_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_component="$component", path=~"$graphqlPath"}[$__rate_interval])) by (outcome) / sum(increase(graphql_datafetcher_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", app_kubernetes_io_component="$component", path=~"$graphqlPath"}[$__rate_interval])) by (outcome)
